cases.title: Radiology Expert Witness Paid Through Disbursement Funding
cases.description: Radiology Expert Witnesses and other third parties can be paid through deferred "Disbursement Funding" which allows the plaintiff to slow upfront payments.

cases.title: In What Areas Can Insurance Expert Witnesses Consult?
cases.description: Insurance expert witnesses may write reports on many subjects, including insurance custom and practices, coverage, and malpractice. How they deliver those reports is equally important.

cases.title: Real Estate Appraiser Allowed to Testify in Lease Dispute
cases.description: An appraiser was allowed to testify as a Real Estate Valuation Expert Witness in a case involving the value of a property with, and without, improvements.
